title: Software engineer
pitch: After 4 years developing a product in a start-up and after its acquisition, the challenges that I loved were new feature design and implementation to continuously improve the product, as well as scaling and orchestrating the underlying infrastructure.
I'm now looking for a project on which I would be involved in technical challenges, and also be contributing to the product vision and development.

text: Relocation after the acquisition of PriceMatch, Senior Developer and Team Lead.
bullets: Integration of the product with the company's databases, scaling the code and infrastructure from 1000 to 200 000 customers.
Infrastructure migration to in-house datacenters: MySQL and NoSQL databases, deployments migrated to Docker and OpenShift

Creation of numerous tools for our development environment: database synchronizations, Docker-based development workflows, set-up and maintainance of our continuous integration and continuous deployment pipelines.
Implementation of the yield management platform for the hotel industry: back-end with Ruby on Rails, conception of database structures and new features.
Ad-hoc development on other projects: marketing website updates, implementation of the algorithms with Python, new front-end features development with Backbone.js and Marionette.js.
